The best fun and simple semi-realistic military FPS as of now. The mechanics are fairly simple to learn and hard to master, whereas the team experience can be fairly frustrating a significant amount of the time. Luckily all of the in-game purchases are cosmetic. Get this if you enjoy a chill FPS experience with some satisfying moments. Don't play competitive.
